items.sentence: Tom took another swig of beer from his glass.
Tom is one of the most liberal people I know.
You should be more thoughtful of your safety.
You should put safety before everything else.
You can see the roof of the house from there.
You may go out as long as you come back soon.
You had better not speak loudly in this room.
You may give this ticket to whoever wants it.
You should make better use of your free time.
I think that you're not telling me something.
What makes you think that Tom will like this?
When was the last time that you ate a cookie?
I think that we have time for a drink or two.
My parents wouldn't allow me to go by myself.
Many people respect you. Don't let them down.
The president's term of office is four years.
With these headphones, I can't hear anything.
You know that you need to do that, don't you?
You know that you have to do that, don't you?
I think we're just prolonging the inevitable.
